tool_description: Finance Text Sentiment API provides sentiment where generic sentiment analysis fails.
name: Finance Text Sentiment
title: Finance Text Sentiment

api_list.name: Negative Sentiment Example
api_list.description:
Provide a "text" value as any finance text/headline/tweet and get a sentiment with sentiment_score. 

Note: For debugging reasons, the request text is also returned for now, which will be disabled in the future.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Stilo International (LON:STL) Stock Price Passes Below 200 Day Moving Average

api_list.name: Positive Sentiment Example
api_list.description:
Provide a "text" value as any finance text/headline/tweet and get a sentiment with sentiment_score. 

Note: For debugging reasons, the request text is also returned for now, which will be disabled in the future.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Liberum Capital Reaffirms Buy Rating for MJ Gleeson (LON:GLE)
